scripts.build:spa: npm run fetch:content:prod && ng build --configuration spa
scripts.build:spa:dev: npm run fetch:content:dev && ng build --configuration development
scripts.build:ssr: npm run fetch:content:prod && ng build --configuration production && ng run personal-blog-front:server:production
scripts.build:ssr:dev: npm run fetch:content:dev && ng build --configuration development && ng run personal-blog-front:server:development
scripts.build:ssg: npm run fetch:content:prod && ng build --configuration production && node scripts/prerender.mjs
scripts.build:ssg:dev: npm run fetch:content:dev && ng build --configuration development && node scripts/prerender.mjs
scripts.serve:spa: npm run build:spa && npx http-server dist/personal-blog-front/browser --port 8080 --cors -P http://localhost:8080/index.html
scripts.serve:ssg: npm run build:ssg && npx http-server dist/personal-blog-front/browser --port 8080 --cors
scripts.serve:spa:dev: npm run build:spa:dev && npx http-server dist/personal-blog-front/browser --port 8080 --cors -P http://localhost:8080/index.html
scripts.serve:ssg:dev: npm run build:ssg:dev && npx http-server dist/personal-blog-front/browser --port 8080 --cors
